question.title: How to give writable permission to a file in Dex File in Android Studio?
question.body:
I am trying to work with a dex file. I opened it in a new project in Java. When editing a file in that dex file, it says 'read only'. The lock option and make file writable option from top left is not working for this one. Usually works for files on the left in android studio.

Any solutions?

enter image description here

I have tried various things like the lock option and unlock option and also went to file properties and then make file writable but none of it works.

answers.body:
You can't. And if you're releasing via Google Play, it's against the terms of service for Google Play to edit or load additional dex files at runtime. You will be banned if caught.

If this is not for a Google Play app (if it's for a personal app), you can write a new dex file and load it via DexClassLoader

question_comments.body: Android Studio is not designed to edit dex files. In the UI you can simply look into dex files nothing more. If you want to edit dex file(s) decompile the APK using apktool utility.
